results.title: Pituitary gigantism presenting with depressive mood disorder and diabetic ketoacidosis in an Asian adolescent.
results.text_hl: He was then administered @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, 500 mg twice daily, and to date, his serum glycohemoglobin has been <7%.
